'''Siriondil''' ({{TA|570}}<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}</ref> – {{TA|830|n}},<ref name="South">{{App|South}}</ref> aged 260) was the eleventh [[Kings of Gondor|King of Gondor]].

==History==
Siriondil's rule was apparently uneventful. He had two children, [[Tarannon]] and [[Tarciryan]].<ref name="South"/>

He was succeeded by his illustrious son [[Tarannon Falastur]], the first of the four [[Ship-king|Ship-kings of Gondor]].

==Etymology==
''Siriondil'' is [[Quenya]]. It is not glossed, but as Paul Strack explains, it probably means "Sirion-lover", from the river name ''[[Sirion]]'' and the suffix ''[[-ndil|-(n)dil]]'' ("lover, friend").<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://www.eldamo.org/content/words/word-904302847.html|articlename=Q. ''Siriondil'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=19 July 2021}}</ref>
